block.p: TERRACCIANO - Alexandra Flowerton. Age 100, on Saturday September 9, 2000, in Chevy Chase, MD. Beloved wife of the late Baron Guglielmo Terracciano, of Naples, Italy, survived by niece Nina Foch, of Beverly Hills, CA, and a grand nephew, Dirk Dewell. Memorial services to be announced. In lieu of flowers, memorial contributions may be made to The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund.
